<div id="main" class="col-md-9" role="main">

# rxclassR

<div class="section level1">

This package defines client functions for NIH rxclass API.

The NIH RxNorm API can provide “rxcui” identifiers for drugs. Patients
with polypharmacy can have different configurations of drug classes as
defined by RxClass API. This package helps to produce summaries of drug
usage in cohorts.

<div class="figure">

![](reference/figures/ups.png)

upset diagram

</div>

</div>

</div>

<div id="main" class="col-md-9" role="main">

# Package index

<div class="section level2">

## All functions

</div>

<div class="section level2">

-   `getclass()` : given rxcui, produce a list from rxclass 'byRxcui'
-   `getcodesNOURISHbase()` : helper in channing system
-   `getpath()` : decode a classid and provide information on the
    hierarchy in which it is included
-   `make_upset()` : produce an upset plot for drug categories based on
    output of \`summ\` applied to multiple prescription series
-   `setsumm()` : provide a summary for a set of Rx codes that might
    represent a patient's profile
-   `summ()` : produce a summary from a getclass collection

</div>

</div>

<div id="main" class="col-md-9" role="main">
